title: GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto - Lightweight, Powerful Pro Salon Blow Dryer with Diffuser & 2 Concentrator Nozzle Attachment Tools (Under 1LB)
descriptions:
GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold – IQ Perfetto

Meet the ultra-light, high-performance dryer designed to elevate your routine. The IQ Perfetto delivers professional results with intelligent features in a sleek, ergonomic body that weighs under 1 lb.

Key benefits:
- Dries hair up to 30% faster: Advanced airflow design multiplies air output for swift, even drying.
- Powerful, ultra-fast motor: 1700W brushless motor spins up to 7x faster than traditional dryers for salon-level performance with reduced noise and longer life.
- Smart styling control: LED Memory Configuration offers 18 customizable settings with auto-diagnosis to optimize performance and simplify your go-to routine.
- Cleaner air, healthier hair: Innovative microfilter prevents tiny particles from entering the motor, while Auto-Clean technology reverses turbine direction to self-clean after use.
- Advanced hair care: Oxy Active Technology helps purify the scalp and enhance shine and color vibrancy.

Design and attachments:
- Ergonomic, lightweight construction for effortless handling and reduced arm fatigue.
- Includes diffuser for defined curls and waves.
- Two concentrator nozzles for precise, smooth blowouts.
- Available colors: Silver, Black.

Perfect for:
- Fast, professional-quality blowouts at home or in the salon.
- All hair types seeking speed, control, and healthier-looking results.
- Stylists and travelers who want maximum power without the weight.

What’s in the box:
- GAMA Italy IQ Perfetto Hair Dryer (Rose Gold finish)
- 2 concentrator nozzles
- Diffuser

Specifications:
- Weight: Under 1 lb
- Motor: 1700W brushless
- Performance: 30% faster drying; motor up to 7x faster than traditional dryers
- Controls: LED display, 18 memory settings, auto-diagnosis
- Technologies: Oxy Active, Auto-Clean, innovative microfilter

Experience the lightest, smartest way to dry—sleek design, pro power, and intelligent care in one compact tool.
